thoracic adolescent idiopathic scoliosis of more than 80 degrees:
pedicle screws versus hybrid instrumentation. Eur Spine J 2008;17:
[27] Karatoprak O, Unay K, Tezer M, et al. Comparative analysis of pedicle
screw versus hybrid instrumentation in adolescent idiopathic scoliosis
surgery. Int Orthop 2008;32:523

junctional kyphosis in adolescent idiopathic scoliosis following pedicle
screw, hook, or hybrid instrumentation. Spine (Phila Pa 1976)

results of pedicle screw and hook instrumentation in posterior correction
and fusion of idiopathic thoracic scoliosis. J Spinal Disord Tech

appearance is improved more by all pedicle screw than by hybrid
constructs in surgical treatment of adolescent idiopathic scoliosis. Spine

screw instrumentation for posterior spinal correction surgery in
adolescent idiopathic scoliosis: a curve
ﬂ
exibility matched-pair study.
Arch Orthop Trauma Surg 2012;132:633

adolescent idiopathic scoliosis. J Pediatr Orthop 2012;32:490

mentation in adolescent idiopathic scoliosis. J Spinal Disord Tech

one? J Orthop 2013;10:54

for
ﬂ
exible thoracic curves in adolescent idiopathic scoliosis: a
